author: Shuchen Song
comment: I need to admit that it has a very elegant design. However, after using it, i found out that both app launcher and ok google detection slows down significantly. Also, it seems a little blur on Huawei Watch, i am not sure whether it is related to the resolution of the textures used by the app.
title: Slows everything

author: Mike Shappell
comment: Overall, I love the simplicity of this face, but it kills the battery on my watch (especially given that it does almost nothing). This needs to get fixed.
title: Great face, poor battery life

author: Daniel Schless
comment: Just wish it had a bit more functionality.  For example, center tap to see upcoming calendar events
title: Great looking watchface

author: Kenneth Jerney
comment: Would be nice if we had color options for the hands.

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi Kenneth, thanks for contacting us.

The "black version" is like an sleep mode from the watch in order to save battery life, this is automatic but you can enable/disable it in "settings -> screen always on". If you enable this option after ten seconds while screen is on it will enter in "black mode".

Hope it helped you.

author: Sasha M
comment: overlay fixed thanks! but second hand is off centre now looks bad

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi Sasha,
This issue has been fixed.

We apologize for the inconvenience.

title: please fix it

author: h_zee13 !!!
comment: Like another reviewer mentioned, is it possible that you add an option to have the black version (battery saver mode) as the primary watch face?
title: Great looking watch face.

author: Alastair Tye Samson
comment: Four in Roman numerals is IV not IIII

reply.author: OMITSIS
reply.content:
Hi Alastair,

thanks for your feedback.

You are right and the number four in roman numerals is written IV. In watch design, though, it is usually the case that the notation IIII, although incorrect, is chosen for being it more plain and smooth to the rest of the elements in the sphere.

Thanks a lot for liking our watch faces!

title: Good design but 4 is STILL wrong!
